Package marytts.language.tib

Class Summary
ContourGenerator The Tibetan contour generator module.
KlattDurationModeller The calculation of acoustic parameters module.
Phonemiser The Tibetan Phonemiser First checks, if the tokens are defined in the lexicon (lexicon_tib.txt) If not, letter-to-sound rules (defined in syllableRules.xml) are applied Created on 24.05.2005
Prosody  
Tokeniser This class tokenises the wylie-transcribed tibetan sentence in RAWMARYXML_tib into processed syllables in PARSEDSYL_tib, which is also in XML-format.
ToneBuilder The Tibetan tonebuilder Checks first whether the tone is defined in the lexicon If the tone is not defined in the lexicon the tone-rules (defined in toneRules.xml) are applied.
